00000001000001000000000000000101
// Linha 11: add r0 #1
00001011000000100000000000000001
// Linha 12: add r3 10101010
00001100000001000100100010101010
// Linha 5: add r1 #8
00000101000000100001100000001000
// Linha 6: add r1 #16
00000110000000100001100000010000
// Linha 7: add r1 #32
00000111000000100001100000100000
// Linha 8: add r4 r1
00001000000000000110000000011000
// Linha 9: halt
00001001111111111111111111111111
